body.p:
If your application is already near version 2016.02, you only have to update your pom.xml (using DocPortal, you find this file in docportal/config):
[...] <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>application-model</artifactId> <version>2016.02</version> [...] <dependency> <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>mycore-{component}</artifactId> <version>2016.02</version> <optional>false</optional> </dependency> [...]
In the next step you have to build your application again mvn clean install or in DocPortal ant resolve && create.jar create.scripts create.webapp.
